description:
Haruue marks her first appearance in episode 17 where she is helped in a search for her lost locket by Tsuzuri. Later she reappears as an out-of-season transfer student into Sakugawa Middle School`s 2nd year and becomes Uiharu`s roommate.
The locket actually contains a picture of Edasaki Banri. Haruue was raised at a child care institute as a child error. When she was young, she held a strong telepathic connection to Edasaki who stayed at the same institute for some time.
name: Haruue Erii
